location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 23 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus reports that he had furnished the Envoy to the Court of Persia (Lieutenant-Colonel John Macdonald) with certain stores for the use of his mission to Tehran.The letter is followed by an enclosure to the above, being a receipt and list of the stores in question, signed by Macdonald and dated 2 May 1826.
